オプション1: The four of them gathered in Trapezoid Man’s room.
"This thing here... I think it might be copper ore."
Star Man showed it to Trapezoid Man.
"I’ve seen it in a game before. If you smelt it, it turns into copper—at least in that game."
"If we smelt this, do you think it’ll turn into copper?"

"I doubt we can get it hot enough. A campfire probably won’t work.
Maybe we can melt it with magic?"

"I think you need to build something like a chimney and blow air from underneath.
I saw a video like that once."

"Yeah, I might’ve seen that too.
But we don’t really need that to build a boat, do we?"

"It’s not necessary for the boat itself,
but it could help with processing wood.
Also, if we can make a pot, it might help us survive longer while sailing.
And right now, we need weapons to move safely through the forest."
"Yeah, good point. Don’t you usually make that kind of stuff out of bronze?"
"I think so. Does anyone know the difference between bronze and copper?"
